name: Church of The Immaculate Heart of Mary

reviews.text:
A peaceful and welcoming place of worship.
The Church of the Immaculate Mary offers a serene and spiritual atmosphere. The architecture is beautiful, and the interior is peaceful, making it a perfect place for reflection and prayer. The staff and congregation are friendly and welcoming, creating a warm and inclusive environment. Whether you're attending mass or simply visiting to admire the tranquility of the space, it's a truly uplifting experience. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a place of spiritual solace.

üü® Every Chinese New Year and on various occasions, I would come here to this church to visit my late parents' niches ( the dear departed).

‚ùáÔ∏èThe church grounds are rather spacious and pleasant looking. The columbarium is at basement below. üôèüèª I miss my dear beloved parents alot.

It's been 40 glorious years since I last set foot in this humble and graceful church, and oh, how time flies! While the physical architecture may have undergone changes over the years, the spirit that captivated my younger self remain as vibrant as ever.

Today, as I kneel before the altar, I cannot help but reflect on the passage of time this church dedicated to the immaculate heart of Mary, has been a beacon of hope, love, and charity for the generations over the ages.

A very nice and homey chapel like church that is fully air conditioned and has comfortable pews with knee pads for kneeling.

Honestly I could relax and fall asleep in peace here and didn't feel any burning sensations.

5/5 would come again.
If you like to attend mass in a church with very strong aircon, this is one of them ! üò¨
